summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of SCADA Monitoring System for LR Energy Biogas Plant. All major features tested including login, role-based access control (HEAD_OFFICE and MNRE), dashboard components, trends page, reports page, and session management. All tests PASSED.
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED/HARDCODED in frontend components - no backend API integration yet
Code structure is clean with proper component separation
Role-based access control is properly implemented
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: N/A - All data is hardcoded in frontend
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features are working correctly. When backend API is implemented, need to test: 1) Real data integration, 2) PDF/CSV actual file downloads, 3) Real-time data updates
